head.title: Fleisher and Jenkins Share the Lead

identified-content.classifier: St Charles Golf and Country Club (Winnipeg)

hedline.hl1: Fleisher and Jenkins Share the Lead

abstract.p: Bruce Fleisher ties with Tom Jenkins at 10-under 206 through 54 holes at AT&T Canada Senior Open at St Charles Golf and Country Club in Winnipeg, Manitoba; roundup of other golf scores (M)

block.p: Bruce Fleisher made a 20-foot birdie putt from the fringe on the last hole yesterday for a share of the lead in the AT&T Canada Senior Open.
Fleisher is tied with Tom Jenkins at 10-under 206 through 54 holes at St. Charles Golf and Country Club in Winnipeg, Manitoba.
Bruce Fleisher made a 20-foot birdie putt from the fringe on the last hole yesterday for a share of the lead in the AT&T Canada Senior Open.
Fleisher is tied with Tom Jenkins at 10-under 206 through 54 holes at St. Charles Golf and Country Club in Winnipeg, Manitoba.

''It surprised the heck out of me when it went in,'' said Fleisher, referring to the long putt on the par-5 18th that capped off a round of four-under 68. ''I got it rolling pretty good. I'm just glad it hit the center of the hole.''

ORR RETAINS TOP SPOT: Gary Orr shot a four-under-par 68 yesterday at the British Masters in Woburn, England, to keep the lead after three rounds, while Colin Montgomerie pulled to within two strokes with a 66.
